restaurants_bars.name: Xfinity Live!
restaurants_bars.description: A popular dining and entertainment complex in the heart of the city's sports district. It's popular among sports fans for its great atmosphere.

restaurants_bars.name: Chickie's & Pete's
restaurants_bars.description: Famous for their CrabfriesÂ®, Chickie's & Pete's offers a fun, sports-themed atmosphere.

restaurants_bars.name: P.J. Whelihan's Pub + Restaurant
restaurants_bars.description: A local favorite and great place to catch a game, located less than a mile from the stadium.

accommodations.name: Holiday Inn Philadelphia Stadium
accommodations.description: The closest hotel to Lincoln Financial Field.

accommodations.name: Courtyard by Marriott Philadelphia South at The Navy Yard
accommodations.description: A modern, relaxed hotel located within walking distance of the stadium.

accommodations.name: The Study at University City
accommodations.description: A boutique hotel and cultural hub located a short drive from the stadium.

tourist_attractions.name: Independence National Historical Park
tourist_attractions.description: This 55-acre park in downtown Philadelphia is known as 'America's most historic square mile.' which includes the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall.

tourist_attractions.name: Philadelphia Art Museum
tourist_attractions.description: One of the largest and most important art museums in the United States, located at the end of the Benjamin Franklin Parkway. It's also famous from the movie 'Rocky'.

team_related_activities.name: Eagles Pro Shop
team_related_activities.description: Located within Lincoln Financial Field, this is the ultimate destination for Eagles fans to show their support with official team merchandise.

team_related_activities.name: Eagles Training Camp
team_related_activities.description: Open to the community, fans can watch the Eagles train at this summer event.

options.description: Philadelphia's subway service that offers direct access to Lincoln Financial Field from numerous spots throughout the city. On game days, there are often special 'Sports Express' trains.
Multiple SEPTA bus routes (4, 17) operate on game days to get fans to the stadium from various locations around the city.
There are several designated pick-up & drop-off zones conveniently located around Lincoln Financial Field complex.
